(OK, scratch the last post with Spears)

Spears:;

She looked and saw rodimus was out of the chamber and decided to run 
back to the hallway where that bot was.  She pulled out two quills 
and ran back.

She turned the corner and saw Rodimus and Xiane fighting the Preds. 
She came up behind Rod, "Glad to see you again. Have a nice nap?" She 
said with a smile and she threw both quills, one at each pred.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> Rodimus was searching through the ruble, when he heard the shots 
from
> the engine room. He ran there, and saw Xain, and the Preds.
> "Back off Predicons!" He said, shooting a rocket at them.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit watched KitKat go off. This was the hard part about being a
> soldier. He didn't like leaving her to fight alone. He would keep 
watch,
> and if she got in trouble he would be there.
